headline: BP Plans 8% Shale Output Increase, Targets 650,000 Barrels a Day
summary: BPX Energy aims to lift shale production 8% this year and reach 650,000 barrels a day by decade's end, even as rivals curb growth

raw.headline: BP Plans 8% Shale Output Increase, Targets 650,000 Barrels a Day
raw.summary: BPX Energy aims to lift shale production 8% this year and reach 650,000 barrels a day by decade's end, even as rivals curb growth

headline: VNOM Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates on Higher Production Volume
summary: Viper Energy Q4 earnings top estimates on surging output, but lower prices and a $408M impairment weigh on the year-over-year bottom-line comparison.

raw.headline: VNOM Q4 Earnings Beat Estimates on Higher Production Volume
raw.summary: Viper Energy Q4 earnings top estimates on surging output, but lower prices and a $408M impairment weigh on the year-over-year bottom-line comparison.
